main.name: Meng Lin
main.description: I am a software engineer who is experienced in web/app/blockchain development. This project is a resume webpage that can be used as the project landing page or resume page. Built with react
main.bio: Creative and results-oriented Blockchain Full Stack Software Engineer with a focus on the design and implementation of backend side. Skilled in agile processes, backend and frontend development, and creating financial dApp on blockchain. Lover of everything related to generate innovation and new knowledge. Problem solver who faces them with a smile and solves them as quickly as possible. I am interested in winter sports such as snowboarding. I worked with Software Development Life Cycle(SDLC) and agile methodologies And I am familiar with blockchain concepts and know how to implement Expertise in Rust, Cosmwasm, Solidity, Contract, Truffle & Hardhat and Web3 / Angular, React, Javascript, Node JS and UI with Responsive Designs.

education.description: Be honored with bachelor's degree in Computer Science under the robust educational background. I studied about Web development, Software Engineering, App Development and Project management

work.title: Smartcontract Developer & Full Stack Developer
work.description: I was owed a comfortable and easy-to-manage environment and blockchain applications. For this, I developed smartcontracts using terra.js and integrated it with frontend. I published a pre-sale web application to help the team raise over $1.5 million. Technologies: Git, AWS, npmjs, React, TypeScript, Rust, Terra.js, ICO, NodeJS, Express, MongoDB

work.title: Smartcontract Developer
work.description: I needed to develop smartcontracts for a crypto exchange platform and app. I developed successfully by using solidity. Technologies: Solidity, Hardhat, Web3, Ethereum

work.title: Full Stack / Smart contract developer
work.description: Developed and deployed NFT contract. Developed NFT Marketplace platform - DeFi. Implemented platform with blockchain network. Technologies: React, Web3, JavaScript, Blockchain, Solidity, Smart contract, Hardhat, NFT

work.title: Full Stack Developer
work.description: In this period, I got 30 jobs with $ 150k earning and 100% Top Rated. I developed 20+ websites & 5 mobile apps.
